participant_1.background:
I have a family and a Porsche on my wish list, but I'm only 5'6".
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
my favorite band is the rolling stones.
My greatest challenge is to make sure that all of my students succeed.
my name is todd.

participant_2.background:
I would love to try the local food with my friend.
i am quiet but confident.
I love to watch movies with my dad on a rainy day.
i try to limit how much i eat.
I just finished practicing my bass guitar in the lifeguard station.

content.text: Hey there, I'm Todd. What's your name?
Hello Todd, I'm Ryan. Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too Ryan! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy playing the bass guitar, watching movies with my dad, and trying local food with friends.
That sounds fun! I also like playing the guitar, and I love watching movies with my family.
That's awesome! What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is The Rolling Stones. They're a classic rock band that I've been listening to since I was a kid.
Nice! I've heard good things about them. I'll have to check them out.
You should! I think you'd like them.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
Hey Todd, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher. I teach music at a local high school.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a teacher.
It's a great job! I love working with kids and helping them learn.
That's what I've heard. I'm glad you enjoy your job!
Thanks! I do!
Well, it was nice meeting you Todd. I hope to talk to you again soon!
You too Ryan! Have a great day!
You too!
